tool_input.command: lsof -ti:3456 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null; lsof -ti:5173 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null; echo "Killed old processes"
lsof -ti:3456 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null; lsof -ti:5173 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null; sleep 2 && cd /Users/jnarowski/Dev/sourceborn/src/agent-workflows-monorepo-v2/apps/web && pnpm dev
tool_input.description: Kill all processes and start fresh
